name: vifi

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
ViFi is a collection of python and perl scripts for identifying viral
integration and fusion mRNA reads from NGS data.

dependencies.name: hmmer
dependencies.description:
HMMER is used for searching sequence databases for sequence homologs,
and for making sequence alignments. It implements methods using
probabilistic models called profile hidden Markov models (profile HMMs).

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: py-pysam
dependencies.description: A python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.
